meaningMnemonic: The poor <radical>alligator</radical> was taken far inland by a <radical>tsunami</radical>. Now his only source of water is a tiny <kanji>pond</kanji> that barely fits his body, and doesn't even provide much food.
readingMnemonic: The worst part about this <kanji>pond</kanji> is that the only thing for the alligator to eat is <reading>chee</reading>se (ち). Cheese may be yummy for humans, but alligators hate it. They'd rather eat the cow the cheese came from. Sadly, this pond is full of cheese.
